src:
Data dan Fakta Premier League: Bournemouth vs Manchester United
01 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 7 Manchester United (MU) akan main tandang melawan peringkat 9 Bournemouth pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Vitality Stadium ini.
Dalam laga tandangnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League musim lalu, MU menang 2-1. Sempat tertinggal oleh gol Callum Wilson menit 11, MU berbalik menang melalui gol-gol Anthony Martial menit 35 dan Marcus Rashford menit 92.
MU selalu menang dalam 4 laga terakhirnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League, kandang dan tandang.
MU menang 6 kali dan tak terkalahkan dalam 7 laga terakhirnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League, kandang dan tandang (M6 S1 K0).
MU baru kalah 1 kali dalam 8 pertemuan dengan Bournemouth di Premier League (M6 S1 K1), yakni dengan skor 1-2 di Vitality Stadium pada musim perdana The Cherries di Premier League (2015/16).
MU selalu unggul saat half time dan menang saat full time dalam 5 dari 7 laga terakhirnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League.
MU selalu mencetak minimal 2 gol dalam 3 laga terakhirnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League.
MU selalu mencetak minimal 2 gol dalam 3 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Bournemouth di Premier League.
MU cuma 2 kali clean sheet dalam 8 pertemuan dengan Bournemouth di Premier League.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Premier League Data and Facts: Bournemouth vs Manchester United
Nov 1 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - 7th place Manchester United (MU) will play away against 9th place Bournemouth in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Saturday (02/11/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at Vitality Stadium.
In their away match against Bournemouth in the Premier League last season, Manchester United won 2-1. Coming from behind by Callum Wilson's goal in the 11th minute, Manchester United won back through goals from Anthony Martial in the 35th minute and Marcus Rashford in the 92nd minute.
MU has always won in the last 4 matches against Bournemouth in the Premier League, home and away.
Manchester United have won 6 times and are unbeaten in their last 7 matches against Bournemouth in the Premier League, home and away (M6 S1 K0).
MU only lost 1 time in 8 meetings with Bournemouth in the Premier League (M6 S1 K1), namely with a score of 1-2 at Vitality Stadium in the inaugural season of The Cherries in the Premier League (2015/16).
MU always excels at half time and won at full time in 5 of his last 7 matches against Bournemouth in the Premier League.
MU has always scored at least 2 goals in his last 3 matches against Bournemouth in the Premier League.
MU has always scored at least 2 goals in his last 3 away games against Bournemouth in the Premier League.
MU only clean sheets twice in 8 meetings with Bournemouth in the Premier League.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
